name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:

Skilled in infrastructure as code with **Terraform** and application development utilizing various database solutions including **MongoDB** and **Atlas**. My prior work encompasses building high-performance applications focused on automation and compliance, notably within the healthcare and financial domains.
